text: Howard Gregory Wright (born December 20, 1967) is an American professional basketball player. Born in San Diego, California, he is a 6'8" (203 cm) 220 lb (100 kg) forward and played collegiately at Stanford University from 1987-1989\. Wright played for the NBA's Dallas Mavericks, Atlanta Hawks, and Orlando Magic.
